TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509CertificateClaimSet extends System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of claims extracted from an X.509 certificate that are associated with an entity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Call the Dispose method when you are finished using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet>. The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet> in an unusable state. After calling the Dispose method, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet>occupied.
> [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet>. Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet> object's `Finalize` method.

Docs.summary: Gets the expiration time for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The issuer for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet> follows the same model as the X.509 chain for an X.509 certificate. For instance, the root <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet> is self-issued and maps to a Certificate Authority. When a certificate in the chain is unavailable, the root <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> is an anonymous issuer.
